name: Fatima Pashazade

aboutpara: As a recent graduate of a prestigious web development bootcamp in Barcelona, I've cultivated a strong passion for technology, particularly in the realm of front-end development. My education has equipped me with a multifaceted skill set that seamlessly aligns with the ever-evolving tech landscape, including expertise in front-end tools and frameworks. I possess sharp troubleshooting abilities, a keen eye for detail, and exceptional client and collaborator engagement skills. My journey in the geospatial sector has provided me with substantial technical expertise, which I'm eager to apply while leveraging front-end tools to create immersive user experiences. More information, such as my previous work experience and references, can be found on my LinkedIn profile.
